title: how can i prevent people from spectating my games?
body: is there a way to prevent people from spectating your games? I really hate when people watch me play, mostly people i know. so i tried to find the setting but was unable to find anything related to spectating.

replies.body: You cant, but there is no reason they would unless they know you and have a reason to do so?
